tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.Shweta Patil at smile studio dental clinic for my upper anterior teeth. My son in law suggested me to visit the doctor. I was so very happy with the treatment. I had a fall and needed immediate replacmenrt of my teeth as I had to attend wedding. Dr. Shweta helped me with my needs and the right treatment for an emergency time. She was very friendly, kind, soft. No pain at all. I am. Very happy I visited her. The clinic and stafff is well equipped and kind. Later I got my teeth extracted and implants placed from Dr. Sanket and Dr. Manisha. The procedurewas totally painless and they treated me with Utmost care. Very happy with my  overall experience at smile studio. Highly recommend my family and friends. Thank Dr. Shweta andteam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Artificial Teeth,Painless Single visit root canal treatment, Tooth Extraction,
review: I came to Smile studio for my front teeth and few extractions. The doctors were very friendly. They explained me what all is needed as I had very limited time in my hand as I had to get back to my hometown. Dr.Shweta was very smooth with extractions and rootcanals. 4 of my rootcanals were done painlessly. Now I can smile with confidence as my front teeth look very good now. Thankyou for giving me this beautiful smile painlessly and in limited time period Dr.sanket,Dr Manisha andDr. Shweta. The staff is very polite and helpful. Highly recommend my relatives and friends smile studio.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am someone who was terrified of visiting a dentist (due to some past bad and painful experience). But i did my research before visiting smile studio and many reviews stated that the treatments at smile studio are not at all painful. However, i was still skeptical but finally decided to give it a go. I had my 1  wisdom tooth  and 2 molars extracted and 1 implant done.   And trust me when i say this, it was not at all painful. Dr Sanket makes sure that the patient is comfortable and the treatment is not at all painful. My fear of going on to dentists has completely vanished. 
WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
reply_text:
Thanks a Lot Shivani.
This kind of Feedbacks keeps us motivated and be more patient friendly and remove that fear of dentist from Patients mind.
Appreciate your Kind Words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was my first RCT and I had a really pleasant experience with Doc Sanket Mehta and his team.  Doc Sanket is extremely meticulous, he took a lot of time to explain the procedure to me, give his valuable inputs while ensuring my comfort all throughout. Not only a through professional but also very warm and welcoming and not satisfied until the patient is happy. My sincere gratitude to Doc Sanket and the entire team. 
There is no other dentist I would go to or recommend! 
Sincerely 
Suhani Maheshwari

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Sanket Mehta has a good setup and experienced hand on Dental Care.

However I found it to be prohibitively expensive. For just cleaning of one wisdom tooth he charged Rs. 1500/- ALSO OFFERED TO PURCHASE AN EQUIPMENT WHICH IS AVAILABLE CHEAPER ONLINE.
reply_text:
Greetings sir,
Sir 1500 is the consultation and cleaning charges .
As you know due to various Precautions and protocols that we have to maintain it is the sanitisation charges along with the localised cleaning and scaling that we did.
Also for the machine please send us the screen shot of the same and we will talk to the respective executives and get your refund back in case of the product being sold cheaper online.
Regards, Dr Sanket Mehta .

review:
I visited Smile studio for a smile design treatment (ongoing). For this process I had to undergo root canals for 2 teeth. I was really scared and worried ( which most of the people generally are) about the treatment. But Dr. Sanket is really good and takes you through the entire process just so that you are aware and the treatment is completely painless. I did not even feel the initial local anesthesia needle prick. 
Also, liked the way the appointments are scheduled according to the convince of the patient and absolutely no wait time. 
I finally have found a dentist I could walk up to without fear. :)
Thank you.
reply_text: Thanks a ton..Really appreciate the feedback ..
